title: So... telling people to kill themself is now ok by RIOT?
body:
Cool, can we start using it in game now? 

I mean, we dont have to say kys, we just say "jump into a turbine pls". Golden age for flamers I guess xD

(I still think the whining about the Pax event is pure BS, still wont support a RIOT member telling people, no matter hwat gender, to kill themself...)
